work.title: Universidad de Los Andes GRID Certificate Authority Certificate Policy and Certificate Practices Statement

edition.label: Weaver
edition.description: A Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) Certificate Policy (CP) and Certification Practice Statement (CPS) for the Universidad de Los Andes GRID Certification Authority (ULAGRID). This CP is formatted according to Request for Comment (RFC) 3647. A CP is a security policy determining the expectations for trust surrounding the creation, use, and revocation of a PKI certificate.
